name: Melanie Comet: Flash of the Century
name_original: Melanie Comet: Flash of the Century
description:
[So, what is Melanie Comet about?]

”Melanie Comet” is a mystery adventure game series made with Rpg maker MV. It’s a Point and Click game with a visual novel style story.

------------------------------------------------------------

The game file currently downloadable is a demo.

 The full game is still in development.

------------------------------------------------------------

[Melanie Comet : Flash of the Century]

Melanie Comet wants to be a photographer. But she never succeeded in making money, so she gets an internship at the company F.A.S.T. What mysteries await you? Who knows, gotta check it out.

[Features]

-Original art

-Original soundtrack

-...with a bunch of mysteries and wonders ahead!

------------------------------------------------------------

[Estimated playtime]

demo: around 20 minutes

[Genre]

Point and Click adventure game

[Programs]

Rpg Maker MV

[Director/Art/Music]

Pado

------------------------------------------------------------

[Version info: 1.0.0]

-image and text loading can be a bit laggy

-the game is run on windows(for computer/pc/laptops)

(Patches and updates can take time.)

------------------------------------------------------------

[How to play the game?]

Click the “Game.exe” inside the folder to play the game.

------------------------------------------------------------

The game "Melanie Comet : Flash of the Century" is a demo of the real game.

It is the tutorial of the real game.

Consider the finished game may become different from the demo.

Please send me emails if any bugs occur.

(Send an email to pado10620@gmail.com, Sending a screenshot of the error and explaining the details of when and where the bug happened would be appreciated.)

Unauthorized distribution and modification of the game without permission is prohibited.

Game reviews are always welcome.

------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for reading.

I hope this short game will make your day.
